Package com.illiasalohub.movieapp.controller

package com.illiasalohub.movieapp.controller
Provides the controller class for the Movie Management application. This package contains class that handle the interaction between the user interface and the model. Controllers receive input from views, process that input (potentially modifying the model), and update views in response to changes in the model. The MainController class, orchestrates the flow of data between the views and the models, managing the application's state and responding to user input.

    MainController
